article_title: How Open Technology Can Save Government

article_metadata.author: Greg Satell

og.description: The Obama administration had been preparing for years to launch its signature policy, the Affordable Care Act, otherwise known as Obamacare.  With everything riding in the balance, the whole effort very nearly failed—because of a website. Well, not a website exactly, but a dizzying array of servers, protocols and regulations. The [...]
